snippet: Harman International, which makes audio systems for cars, and Yelp, an online listings company, fell sharply after posting weak earnings..
abstract: Stocks record largest drop in two weeks as investors respond to disappointing earnings reports.
lead_paragraph: Harman International, which makes audio systems for cars, and Yelp, an online listings company, fell sharply after posting weak earnings..

headline.main: Shares Go Into Reverse as Earnings Reports Dishearten
headline.print_headline: Shares Go Into Reverse as Earnings Reports Dishearten
